version_description:
We've addressed some of the most common feedback:
* Live TV is closer to real-time
* Cellular streaming is easier to enable
* Improved stability

We've heard your feedback and made the following improvements!

* Faster loading time
* HDMI-to-TV support
* More stability

* Easier to send feedback in app
* Cellular data usage is "on" by default

* Show logos and other visual improvements
* Continue watching your last video more easily
* Search for answers to FAQs
* Dismiss video controls by tapping the screen

* Push and in-app notifications
* Easier to keep track of which episode you last watched
* Search for or quickly browse TV Providers
* Various bug fixes and usability improvements
* Various bug fixes and usability improvements

* Go deeper into some shows with articles, games and more
* Performance improvements
* You can now find our live sports from the TV App!

* Introduced home-based authentication for Xfinity customers
* Fixed sign-in issues for PS Vue and Consolidated Communications customers
* You can now receive In-app messages
* Removed the white home indicator during video playback on iPhone X
* Bug fixes

* Skip commercial breaks with new interactive ads (available on select shows)
* Bug fixes

New app, who dis?
Long time, no update. But the wait is over. Here’s the ALL NEW TBS APP!

SHINY NEW DESIGN
We’ve redesigned the whole app from the ground-up. Take it for a spin and get a whiff of that new app smell.

EXPLORE YOUR FAVORITES
A new curated experience means it’s now easier than ever to find and dig into your favorite shows and live sports + our always-fresh collections of your favorite movies!

BETTER. FASTER. STABLE-ER
The look and feel isn’t all that’s changed. Under the hood, we rebuilt how we stream video on your phone to make it faster and more stable so you can watch all. day. long.

STAY TUNED
We’re just getting started. Keep an eye out for new features and Original content coming soon!

* Improved casting experience
* Fixed visual bugs on iPhone 11 family
* Reduced number of ads shown before live sports
* Updated look-and-feel
